metadata.name: Solene: Honored Champion 01
metadata.description:
Solene is one of the Honored Champions of Light. This means she belongs the exclusive group of heroes who first defend Earthe and her kingdoms from darkness. 

Solene is a Mage who hails from the region of Midrein; a land lush in forests nestled under the base of the Mountains of Mist perfect for practicing Mages to take their studies and apprenticeships. 
Solene was a high achieving and advanced student early on, with a keen sense of justice making her a more than suitable candidate for the call to become a Champion of Light.

She fought hard to maintain peace in and around the Kingdom of Arcadia. Her skills focused on using magical texts, charms, and calling upon nature to grant her powers to overtake enemies. Often times she appeared to to not be Solene during these times but a much older entity that seemed to take control of the soft spoken Solene.

Solene comes from a large family of six, and is the eldest child. Her parents were very proud to learn their daughter had magical abilities. They believed that the Gods blessed their first born with magic as thanks for their work in caring for the forests.

Solene is #1 of a 100 unique honored champions  
(each champion is 1:1)
